dict.acceptation: 推荐；劝告；使显得吸引人；托付；

sent.orig: I recommend buying this dictionary. [I recommend you to buy this dictionary.]
For beginners, I recommend the underhand serve. For experienced players I recommend the overhand floater serve.
sent.trans: 对初学者来说，我建议发下手球，对有一定训练经验的我建议发上手飘球。

sent.orig: Could you recommend some local exercises to me?
sent.trans: 能推荐一些有当地特色的运动吗？

sent.orig: Why do you recommend walking and step counters?
sent.trans: 你为甚么推荐步行并且要计数？

sent.orig: This is to recommend Jack Wang who comes from a family of good standing in Taiwan.
sent.trans: 在此推荐Jack王先生，他系来自台湾名声良好的家庭。
